title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Learn the fundamentals of ML with hands-on exercises using Python and popular libraries like scikit-learn.

title: Android Development Bootcamp
description: Build your first Android app from scratch using Kotlin and Android Studio with modern development practices.

title: Web Development with React
description: Master modern web development with React, hooks, and component-based architecture. Perfect for beginners.

title: Cloud Computing with Google Cloud
description: Explore cloud services, deployment strategies, and serverless computing with Google Cloud Platform.

title: Winter Hackathon 2025
description: 48-hour coding challenge to build innovative solutions for real-world problems. Teams of 2-4 members.

title: Data Science & Analytics
description: Dive into data analysis, visualization, and predictive modeling using Python, pandas, and matplotlib.

title: Flutter Cross-Platform Development
description: Build beautiful mobile apps for both iOS and Android using Flutter and Dart programming language.

title: AI & Ethics in Technology
description: Discuss the ethical implications of AI, responsible development practices, and the future of technology.

title: DevOps & CI/CD Pipeline
description: Learn modern DevOps practices, containerization with Docker, and automated deployment pipelines.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Master design thinking, user research, prototyping, and creating intuitive user interfaces.

title: Cybersecurity Awareness
description: Understanding common security threats, best practices for secure coding, and protecting digital assets.

title: Spring Innovation Challenge
description: Create innovative solutions for sustainability and green technology. Focus on environmental impact.

title: Blockchain & Web3 Development
description: Introduction to blockchain technology, smart contracts, and decentralized application development.

title: Game Development with Unity
description: Create your first 2D and 3D games using Unity engine with C# scripting and game design principles.

title: Open Source Contribution
description: Learn how to contribute to open source projects, Git workflows, and building your developer portfolio.
